item.title: How to Edit the Text of Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Edit the Text of an Object: With Click With Double Click With Keyboard How to Edit the Alt Text of an Object How to Change Text Color How to Change Text Format No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Edit the Text of an Object With Click Step 1: First select an object. In the menu that opens, click the “Edit text” or pencil button, and type any text.
